SCTX:
Begin DagothTaunt_5

short done

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( done == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetStandingPC == 0 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex C3_DestroyDagoth >= 50 )
	return
endif

if ( Player->GetItemCount "wraithguard" == 0 )
	;don't play if player doesn't have tools
	return
endif

Player->Say  "vo\misc\Dagoth Ur Taunt 5.mp3" "Come. Bring Wraithguard to the Heart Chamber. Together let us free the cursed false gods."
set done to 1

End
